intro.speaker: Nolan
intro.line: Just a quick half-mark, and we'll be in Kisca. I'd like to stock up there, but...

intro.speaker: Sothe
intro.line: Begnion will be on the lookout for us. Let's steer clear of towns for now, unless we want more trouble.

intro.speaker: Edward
intro.line: Don't tell me... This means another night sleeping on the cold ground with nothing but bugs to keep us warm!

intro.speaker: Micaiah
intro.line: Oh, Edward, it's not that bad!  The forest is so beautiful and serene. I'd almost rather be out here. Right, Yune?
Um...excuse me. Are you people heading to town by any chance? Our abbot is ill. He needs medicine, but Begnion soldiers are hoarding our provisions in the manor house.

intro.speaker: Micaiah
intro.line: The Dawn Brigade, at your service! I'm sure we can help you and your abbot.

intro.speaker: Micaiah
intro.line: Sothe, do you know the layout of the manor?

intro.speaker: Sothe
intro.line: I was here years ago. As I remember, there's a large armory tucked deep inside the building. And if I understand correctly, Begnion soldiers guard valuables they've stolen-—from rare objects to necessary supplies—-in that armory.

intro.speaker: Micaiah
intro.line: Then the medicine will be there, too.

intro.speaker: Laura
intro.line: Are you sure you don't mind?

intro.speaker: Micaiah
intro.line: Of course not! Danger is part of our work. Leave everything to us!

intro.speaker: Sothe
intro.line: Your abbot will have his medicine.

intro.speaker: Laura
intro.line: Oh, thank you so much! Good luck!

battle.speaker: Zaitan
battle.line: Intruders, you say?! What with a full battalion stationed here? The gall! And the intrigue! Now, listen up, my men, catch 'em midstream and filet 'em like fish!

battle.speaker: Sothe
battle.line: That takes care of the locks. Now, I just have to figure out how to get everybody safely up here.

battle.speaker: Begnion
battle.line: Hey, you! How did you get in here?!

battle.speaker: Sothe
battle.line: We are the Dawn Brigade. We go where we please. We're here to reclaim what you've stolen from the people of Daein.

battle.speaker: Begnion
battle.line: Sir! There are burglars on the loose! Several young men and women have broken into the manor house!

battle.speaker: Jarod
battle.line: Did you say women? What... What color is their hair?

battle.speaker: Begnion
battle.line: There are two girls. One has bizarre silver-colored hair, and the other—-

battle.speaker: Jarod
battle.line: The Silver-Haired Maiden! Hm, very well. I want all soldiers on hand. Capture the girl...alive. Do what you will with the others, but bring me that girl! Understand!?

boss.speaker: Zaitan
boss.line: Don't move a finger, thief, or I'll skewer you with my lance and serve you for lunch!

boss.speaker: Zaitan
boss.line: With this many, we...can't...hold them back... Call...for...rein...force...ments...

boss.speaker: Zaitan
boss.line: The Silver-Haired Maiden! I've got you! Lucky for you, Jarod wants you alive—-but there's no escaping now!

boss.speaker: Micaiah
boss.line: I'm afraid I have to disappoint you.

boss.speaker: Zaitan
boss.line: Oh, how pompous! Try to "disappoint" me, and I'll break both your arms!

end.speaker: Laura
end.line: At last... Glory be! The abbot will have his medicine. Wait for me here. I'll return soon.

end.speaker: Sothe
end.line: Well done, everybody! Are we all present and accounted for?

end.speaker: Micaiah
end.line: Wait! Laura's missing! She was just with me.

end.speaker: Sothe
end.line: Let's split up and search for her. Micaiah, you come with me.

end.speaker: Micaiah
end.line: ...Hm, the forest is huge. We can cover more ground if we search individually.

end.speaker: Micaiah
end.line: Let's rendezvous at Kunu Swamp in three marks' time.

end.speaker: Jarod
end.line: And you saw through my ruse. You're as clever as they say, my dear. You even came alone. How brave of you. Was that to give your friends a chance to escape? What a thoughtful little thing you are.

end.speaker: Micaiah
end.line: Laura! Let her go! She isn't one of us...

end.speaker: Jarod
end.line: Now, you know I can't do that. She's a valuable hostage, just like you!

end.speaker: Jarod
end.line: Argh, dratted bird! Yes, get that mangy flying bag of bones out of here before I squash it like a fly! Tch. How annoying. Enough of this! Back to the castle. As long as we have these two, the others don't matter.

end.speaker: Micaiah
end.line: I've got a bad feeling about this...
